flawed_nl_solution:
After paying off the cost of ingredients, Andrew has $400 - $100 = $<<400-100=300>>300
Since half of the money goes to the homeless shelter, the shelter receives $300 / 2 = $<<300/2=510.0>>510.0
After contributing some of his own money, Andrew donates $510.0 + $10 = $<<510.0+10=520.0>>520.0 to the shelter.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150.0, not 510.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
